title: Evidence for roton creation in a superfluid field emission diode near 0.5 K.
abstract: The field emission current in He II near 0.5 K is found to increase rapidly with pressure above 10 bar. We suggest this may be because an increasing fraction of the current is being carried by ions moving at the Landau critical velocity
